title: Web Analytics for SFGov Sites - 2015 (Q1+Q2+Q3+Q4)
description: Web analytics data for SFGov sites

columns.name: Page Title
columns.description: The page titles used on website.

columns.name: Pageviews
columns.description: Page views is the total number of pages viewed. Repeated views of a single page are counted.

columns.name: Unique Pageviews
columns.description: Unique Pageviews is the number of visits during which the specified page was viewed at least once. A unique page view is counted for eachÂ page URL + page title combination

columns.name: Avg. Time on Page
columns.description: The average amount of time users spent viewing a specified page or screen, or set of pages or screens.

columns.name: Entrances
columns.description: Entrances is the number of times visitors entered the site through a specified page or set of pages.

columns.name: Bounce Rate
columns.description: Bounce Rate is the percentage of single-page visits (i.e. visits in which the person left the site from the entrance page without interacting with the page).

columns.name: % Exit
columns.description: %Exit is (number of exits) / (number of pageviews) for the page or set of pages. It indicates how often users exit from that page or set of pages when they view the page(s).
